page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content:
In this area there are a number of different entertainments such as public houses, discos, dances and a Young Farmers Club. These are all attended frequently by the local inhabitants.{ { {Public Houses:}These are the most popular of the pastimes mentioned above. There are two of them in the area, "Bridge End" and "The Royal Oak". Bridge End has a darts team and holds darts matches regularly.
{Discos:}These are held on Friday nights at Gatesgill village hall. They appeal to the younger generation. The discos usually commence at 7.30pm and finish at around 11.00pm. For the adults there are dances which are held occasionally and are well attended. {
